title: Most popular product brands on Facebook 2020
summary: This statistic brands the Most popular Platform brands in 2020 , based on the Facebook of fans on BitTorrent .
'Game of Facebook ' was the most-pirated Platform in 2020 .
The most-downloaded episode of the American fantasy television series created for HBO was downloaded 214.62 millions times .
gold: Coca-Cola is one of the most recognizable brands worldwide , which in this case translates to over 107 million Facebook followers.

Due its global reach , advertisers and marketers have recognized Facebook 's potential as a marketing tool to reach new and existing customers and as a result have come up with new and innovative ways of connecting with their target audiences .
